# <a name="adding-emojis-to-email-messages"></a><span data-ttu-id="7eb52-102">Lisades emojis e-kirju</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7eb52-102">Adding emojis to email messages</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7eb52-103">Lisage emojis s천numites.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7eb52-103">You can insert emojis in your messages.</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="7eb52-104">Olemasoleva e-posti s천numile v천i valige **uued**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7eb52-104">Reply to an existing email or select **New message**.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="7eb52-105">Valige nupp **Lisa emojis**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7eb52-105">Select the **Insert emojis** button</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="7eb52-106">Avaldiste paani avamiseks koostamisakna allosas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7eb52-106">at the bottom of the compose window to open the Expressions pane.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="7eb52-107">Otsige ja valige nimele v천i GIF-pildi lisamiseks.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7eb52-107">Search for and choose the emoji or GIF you want to insert.</span></span>
